email between 8:30am - 2:00pm
each day.

div.p: To view all MCHS videos, and subscribe, please visit our YouTube Channel. Click Here!

td.span:
Minooka Memories Episode 4
Take a look back over the last month in this episode of Minooka Memories!

span.style: white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Cabin Condensed"; font-size: 13px; color: rgb(13, 13, 13);
span.span: Each and every day students are involved with sports, activities, music, clubs, classroom learning, being recognized, helping each other, and so much more.
